message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product that I believe will bring you significant value. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. Let's discuss further!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob, but I have to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to lower the price to $1150000. This is a compromise, but I believe it's still a great value for you considering the product's worth to you is $1500000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to meet you at $1100000, but I need to be closer to the lower end of the spectrum. Can we discuss a price of $1080000?

I understand you're trying to get closer to the lower end, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to make sure I don't leave too much money on the table. I'm willing to meet you at $1090000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000, and I'm willing to give you a slight discount for being a serious buyer.
